name: @the_dissidents/emmm-monorepo
description: monorepo setup for emmm, a better markup language when it comes to typesetting articles.

scripts.dev: pnpm concurrently -k "pnpm run dev:pkgs" "pnpm --filter='kfgui' tauri dev"
scripts.build-mac: pnpm run build:pkgs && pnpm --filter='kfgui' tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin
